hero_backgrounds.usage: Login Page Background, User Dashboard Hero
Admin Sidebar Background, Premium Card Backgrounds

rules: Ensure text contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text.
Use data-testid attributes for all interactive elements (e.g., data-testid='login-submit-btn').
Do not use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns or overlays; use solid colors or heavy blur.
Focus states must be clearly visible with a ring-2 ring-primary.

instructions_to_main_agent.file_extension: Use .js for all component files (e.g., Button.js, Dashboard.js). Do not use .tsx.
instructions_to_main_agent.component_library: Use Shadcn UI components as a base but HEAVILY customize them with the classes provided in 'components' section.
instructions_to_main_agent.icons: Use lucide-react for icons. If not available, use heroicons.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts for any data visualization (Admin Dashboard). Style them with the 'gold' and 'money' color palettes.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_rule: Avoid centering everything. Use the 'Control Room' grid for Admin and 'Tetris' grid for User dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.critical: Do not ask clarifying questions. Implement the design based on these guidelines immediately.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
